sourcesContent:
<template>

  <HeaderMainPage></HeaderMainPage>

  <UserSingleTemplate v-for="user in users" :key="user.id" v-bind="user"></UserSingleTemplate>

  <button @click="mounted"></button>


</template>


<script>

import UserSingleTemplate from "@/components/UserSingleTemplate.vue";
import HeaderMainPage from "@/components/HeaderMainPage.vue";

export default {
  components: {
    UserSingleTemplate,
    HeaderMainPage,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      users: ""
    }
  },
  methods: {
    mounted() {
      const postId = this.$route.params.id;

      fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/users/" + postId)
        .then((response) => response.json())
        .then(data => {

          console.table(data);



        })
    }
  }

}


</script>


<style scoped>
</style>
